fields.label: Google Cloud Storage Bucket Name
fields.regexErrorMessage: Invalid Google Cloud Storage Bucket Name

fields.label: Credentials
fields.labelNote: GCP Service Account credentials JSON for RudderStack to use in loading data into your Google Cloud Storage
fields.footerNote: Create a service account in your GCP Project for RudderStack with roles of 'storage.objectCreator'

fields.label: OneTrust Consent Categories
fields.footerNote: The support for category names is deprecated. We recommend using the category IDs instead of the name as IDs are unique and less likely to change over time, making them a more reliable choice.
